page.title: 05MY STREET - HILLTOP AVENUE
page.content: {HILLTOP AVENUE} Hilltop Avenue is situated between North Road and Hattonrigg Road. In this housing scheme there are a lot of houses, mainly built by the district council.There are three small shops within a reasonable walking distance, and there is a Supermarket and several specialised shops in the Main Street which is not too far away from Hilltop Avenue. There are not many facilities for Children or for teenagers in this area. There is only a Youth Club,but this is quite far away.If you wish to take part in sporting activities you have to go to the Y.M.C.A. which is situated in the Main Street and provuides many varied activities.
